properties.entry: SELECT MEM_ID, CHAT_CONTENT, CHAT_CREATE_DATE, MEMBER_COUNT, MEMBER_NOW, BOARD_TITLE, CHAT_NO, CHAT_STATUS FROM CHAT C LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON (C.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO) LEFT JOIN BOARD B ON (C.BOARD_NO = B.BOARD_NO) WHERE C.BOARD_NO = ? ORDER BY CHAT_CREATE_DATE ASC
SELECT MEM_ID, MEMBER_COUNT, MEMBER_NOW, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_NO FROM BOARD B LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON (B.MEM_NO = M.MEM_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = ?
INSERT INTO CHAT ( CHAT_NO, CHAT_CONTENT, MEM_NO, CHAT_NAME, BOARD_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_CHNO.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ? )
UPDATE CHAT SET CHAT_STATUS = 'Y' WHERE CHAT_NO = ?
